question:
[Roger] and his uncle [Christopher] went to the county fair and went on the ferris wheel [Faye] loves her son [Christopher] very much. He loves her, too. [Carlos] is buying his daughter [Jamie] a brand new car for her birthday. [Gregory] got his son, [Carlos], a car for his birthday. [Daniel] waited at dinner for his sister, [Mary]. She was running late due to a phone call with her brother, [Gregory]. [Gregory] and [Faye] got married in 2017 [Jamie] enjoys playing cards with her brother. His name is [Gregory].
Question: How is [Roger] related to [Daniel]?
